shepp it

Creators of simple solutions, builders of beautiful products

  • Learn More

Our Team

Joell Shepperson and Nick Stocchero met while building health-tech products at Kit Check, a success story out of Rock Health incubator in San Francisco.

As a UX Product Manager and Developer, their skillsets complimented each other, perfectly. After working on a few side projects together, they quickly realized they could deliver better quality solutions in faster timelines than teams twice their size and twice their cost.

They formed shepp it in 2017 to share their Do The Right Thing mantra with the world and to give teams of all sizes the opportunity to explore what technology can bring to their business.

Our Process

We believe in building the right solutions for the right problems. To do this, we run a mix of Lean UX and Agile Development coupled with an intense focus on ROI and business value assessments.

There's no point in reinventing the wheel, in our opinion. Instead, we leverage existing open source frameworks that allow us to work on the real project: validating your solution and getting your product to market, faster.

We call it our Let's Shepp It approach. This means: we won't just hand you an app, we'll deliver you a vetted solution and the tools you'll need to help it grow.

Our Work

We hate overengineering. Instead, we build simple solutions that focus on usability and user experience.

CrypTck

To fill a gap in the cryptocurrency market, we built an SMS alert service that texts customers when their cryptocurrency of choice, reaches personally set benchmarks.

Edge City

Edge City serves as a marketplace for ideas, suggestions and initiatives in Tysons VA. This forum gives residents the opportunity to post, vote and gather support for new policy items impacting their region.

Is Metro On Fire?

Technology can be fun and serve a greater purpose. IsMetroOnFire began as a twitter integration to monitor metro delays and spun into a local sensation and apparel line.

Ready to build? Us too.

We're excited to help bring your ideas to life.
